response.overview: â€‹In the small town of Lidstrom, Indiana, twins Calvin and Kinsey Myers find themselves amidst a scandalous Community Service Competition with one hundred thousand dollars on the line. However, the obnoxious Valedictorian who organizes the event, Elaine Bronson, plots to rig the competition in her favor. The siblings join forces with Salutatorian, Olivia, and the rowdy school mascot, Mitch, to outsmart Elaine in this rowdy, fun filled adventure.
response.tagline: If you can't win it, steal it.
response.title: Serves Em' Right

results.name: Serves Em Right Trailer 1 (2022) -   Olio Road Productions
